item.title: Secure git hosting with gitosis
item.description: I hope you are already using ssh keys, but just in case your not go ahead and generate one with ssh-keygen -t rsa (you should do this on your local box) You may as well go ahead and copy your publick key to your git server now as well. Log into your gitosis server Make sure setuptools is installed sudo aptitude install python-setuptools git clone git://eagain.net/gitosis.git cd gitosis
